page.title: 16OUR FASHIONS
page.content: (Maria and Kellie, age 12): Now there are not so many skinheads as before, but there are more 'Punks'. 'Flower Power' is definitely in, as well as pastel colours. Loose fitting clothes with pointed collars are in fashion. Boys wear tight jeans. Out goes the 'medallion-man' look to be replaced by fashion jewellery - earings in different shades and sizes. Out go the plain look of a couple of years ago and in comes striped, numbered, lettered, flowered and brightly coloured shirts, trousers and long skirts.
